definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: Interest group comes from some people's maintenance of common interests.
sentences.chinese: 利益集团来自于部分人对共同利益的维护。

sentences.english: To ensure peaceful use of outer space is in the common interest of humankind.
sentences.chinese: 确保外空和平利用符合全人类的共同利益。

sentences.english: We should deepen economic cooperation to increase common interests.
sentences.chinese: 深化经济合作，厚植共同利益。

sentences.english: China and India share broad common interest in climate change.
sentences.chinese: 中印在气候变化领域有着广泛的共同利益。

sentences.english: Restoration of diplomatic relations between the US and Cuba is in the common interests of the two countries and the two peoples.
sentences.chinese: 古美恢复外交关系符合两国和两国人民的共同利益。

sentences.english: Shanmugam said bilateral ties have deepened with an increasing of common interests.
sentences.chinese: 尚穆根说，两国关系深入发展，共同利益不断增多。

sentences.english: Sixthly, Hu urged both sides to intensify multilateral coordination so as to safeguard the two countries' common interests.
sentences.chinese: 第六，加强多边协调，维护两国共同利益。

sentences.english: Under the new current situation, both sides share broad common interest.
sentences.chinese: 在当前新形势下，双方拥有广泛的共同利益。

sentences.english: Under the new situation, both sides share more common interest and common language.
sentences.chinese: 新形势下，双方有更多的共同利益和共同语言。

sentences.english: China and Australia shares no fundamental conflict but wide common interests.
sentences.chinese: 中澳没有根本的利害冲突，而是拥有广泛的共同利益。

sentences.english: other expenses paid in the course of bankruptcy proceedings for the common interest of the creditors.
sentences.chinese: 为债权人的共同利益而在破产程序中支付的其他费用。

sentences.english: Further development of China-France relations is in the common interest of the two peoples.
sentences.chinese: 进一步发展中法关系符合中法人民的共同利益。

sentences.english: In both closed-source and open source ecosystems, the participants have common interest.
sentences.chinese: 在封闭源代码和开源生态系统中，参加者有共同利益。

sentences.english: China and ASEAN have far more common interests than differences.
sentences.chinese: 中国和东盟之间共同利益远远大于分歧。

sentences.english: We stand for going along with the historical tide and safeguarding the common interests of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 我们主张顺应历史潮流，维护全人类的共同利益。

sentences.english: Environment-friendly technologies should better serve the common interests of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 气候友好技术应该更好服务于全人类共同利益。

definition: to seek common ground, putting differences aside (idiom)
